0: Last August Prince Harry invited a group of hotel guests back to his £5,000-a-night Las Vegas suite where one of them photographed him and a girl naked during a game of strip pool. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The pictures appeared online and in newspapers around the world, though only one British newspaper, the Sun, defied a request from St James’s Palace not to publish them.
